name: Larger Favorite Post on Profile
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Makes the Favorite post on a users profile a little bigger so you can see more of the image without it cutting off! :) Note: Favorite Post that are not screenshots and are handwritten post instead will repeat! Update 10/7/15: Fixed since the October 7th update broke stuff.

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about: Hey my name is Cody I’m 31 years old I like to play Nintendo games, and I’m a former member of the retired Splatoon team known as Squids Next Door my favorite game series are Mario Kart, Animal Crossing, and Splatoon.
